dmca.title: Correspondent complains of email posted to blog
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: 

I would like to file a notice of infringement regarding my intellectual property on, a blogsite hosted by Blogspot.com.

Despite my repeated requests, the host [private] and his editor, "[private]" have refused to remove my email that I sent as a private correspondence to [private]. [private] posted my email, on his blogsite,
